title: (x) Where can I purchase LaDeeDa? {Forrest}
content:
Anyone know if/where I can purchase the font LaDeeDa?

2000. Informal lettering, art directed by Mia Hurley. Commissioned by gURL.com. Designed at Font Bureau.
author: Soo

comments.content:
Since it was a custom design it isn’t available for licensing.

[http://www.orangeitalic.com/ladeeda.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094454/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/ladeeda.shtml)

LaDeeDa is pretty great. Of a similar flavor — though a little less rambunctious — is Akemi Aoki’s [Pedestria](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094454/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=MVB.118646.0.0).
